title: Cave Mountain (New York)
text: Cave Mountain is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> located in <a href="Greene%20County%2C%20New%20York">Greene County</a>, <a href="New%20York%20%28state%29">New York</a> south of <a href="Windham%2C%20New%20York">Windham, New York</a>. Cave Mountain drains south into <a href="East%20Kill">East Kill</a> and north into <a href="Batavia%20Kill%20%28Schoharie%20Creek%20tributary%29">Batavia Kill</a>.
